user_input: Which NGAP procedure is used for inter-system load balancing? [3GPP Release 17]
response: f41 general and f43 pdngw behaviour.
reference: uplink ran configuration transfer.

user_input: What is covered by enhanced application layer support for V2X services? [3GPP Release 17]
response: enhancement of vehicletoeverything v2x services including the provision of hd map dynamic information and enhancements to support for v2x ues within one v2x service or in a given geographical area.
reference: advanced v2x services.

user_input: What does the Load-Balancing steering mode do? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the loadbalancing steering mode in 3gpp release 17 steers data flow traffic across the 3gpp access and the non3gpp access in an autonomous manner it allows the ue and the upf to select the optimal split percentage for each access type in order to maximize the throughput of the data flow in both the uplink and the downlink direction it also provides an autonomous loadbalance indicator indicating that the ue and the upf can freely select their own percentages which may change over time based on rtt measurements.
reference: splits the traffic of a data flow across 3gpp and non3gpp accesses.

user_input: What is the main objective of intent driven management for service or network management? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to satisfy a newly received intent or an update to an existing intent and to bring the network or services state to satisfy the new or updated intent.
reference: to reduce the complexity of management for network resources.

user_input: What does MINT stand for? [3GPP Release 17]
response: minimization of service interruption.
reference: minimization of service interruption.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Media Streaming AF Event Exposure work item? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to provide a mechanism for event exposure for media streaming sessions.
reference: to support data collection and event exposure by an af to event consumers.

user_input: What is the purpose of load-balancing steering mode enhancements? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of loadbalancing steering mode enhancements in 3gpp release 17 is to provide greater flexibility and autonomy for user equipment ue and uplink network function upf in distributing traffic across different access types maximizing throughput and improving user experience by introducing autonomous loadbalancing mode with adjustable percentages and incorporating threshold conditions to manage realtime metrics.
reference: to enable the ue and upf to freely select split percentages for each access type.

user_input: What is a capability added in the V2X Application Enabler (VAE) layer? [3GPP Release 17]
response: v2x application layer support functions.
reference: v2x service discovery.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Edge Data Network (EDN) in enabling edge applications? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the edge data network edn enables edge applications by providing a local data network that contains edge application servers and the edge enabler server ees enabling discovery of the eass and flexible deployment.
reference: to host the edge application servers and edge enabler server ees.

user_input: What are the three features specified in TS 23.304 for 5G ProSe Direct Communication over NR based PC5 reference point? [3GPP Release 17]
response: broadcast mode groupcast mode and unicast mode.
reference: broadcast mode groupcast mode unicast mode.

user_input: How is service continuity supported for specific slice(s)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: service continuity for specific slices is supported through two scenarios slice resource shortage due to intrara or interra mobility and nonsupported slice due to interra mobility additionally service continuity for a slice or slice instance is supported by ensuring that network slice performance meets slas and remapping remapped slices to ongoing slices when ngran node recovers resources.
reference: through multicarrier resource sharing or resource repartitioning.

user_input: How can UE power consumption due to false paging alarms be reduced? [3GPP Release 17]
response: by introducing the subgroups for ues monitoring the same po and subgrouping a ue shall monitor pdcch in its po for paging if the subgroup to which the ue belongs is paged as indicated via associated paging early indication pei thus reducing ue reception power consumption in idleinactive mode due to false paging alarms.
reference: by dividing ues into multiple subgroups.

user_input: What is the purpose of Generic Bootstrapping Architecture (GBA) in 5GC? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of generic bootstrapping architecture gba in 5gc is to enable authentication and secure bootstrapping of network access for ues while allowing network operators to utilize legacy authentication frameworks for specific use cases.
reference: to enable application functions to establish shared cryptographic material.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Small Data Transmission (SDT) feature in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the small data transmission sdt feature in nr is intended for use with mtc devices that send or receive small amounts of data with minimal network impact eg signalling overhead network resources delay for reallocation.
reference: to enable data transmission in the rrcinactive state for ues with infrequent data traffic.

user_input: What functionality does Signalling Based Activation provide? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the present document defines the possible protocol architectures for transport of ss7 signalling protocols in core network.
reference: request for end user service performance information for one specific ue.

user_input: What are the enhancements for idle/inactive-mode UE power saving in NR? [3GPP Release 17]
response: enhanced idlemode power saving for nr including epowersave long edrx cycles support for cmconnected with rrcinactive state and microsleep within slots in cmidle state.
reference: paging enhancements to reduce ue reception power consumption.

user_input: How does a Multi-USIM UE indicate to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to CM-IDLE state? [3GPP Release 17]
response: a reject paging indication.
reference: by sending a reject paging response to the network.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Slice-Maximum Bit Rate (S-MBR)? [3GPP Release 17]
response: to regulate the average bit rate of a slice of a network.
reference: to limit the aggregate data rate per ue across all qos flows for all pdu sessions associated with a slice.

user_input: What aspects of the Disaster Roaming service are specified in TS 22.011 and TS 22.261? [3GPP Release 17]
response: ts22261 clause631 and ts22011 clause322 specify the aspects of the disaster roaming service.
reference: service requirements for the 5g system.

user_input: What is the purpose of the Provision of potential TRS/CSI-RS occasion(s) to idle/inactive-mode UEs? [3GPP Release 17]
response: the purpose of the provision of potential trscsirs occasions to idleinactivemode ues is to minimize service interruption by providing information about available plmns and access barring check for access identity 3 as specified in ts 38331 9.
reference: to reduce ue power consumption for synchronization.
